key.name: put-to-corner-ne
key.summary: Move to the top right corner

key.name: put-to-corner-nw
key.summary: Move to the top left corner

key.name: put-to-corner-se
key.summary: Move to the bottom right corner

key.name: put-to-corner-sw
key.summary: Move to the bottom left corner

key.name: move-focus-w
key.summary: Focus the window that's west of the current window

key.name: move-focus-s
key.summary: Focus the window that's south of the current window

key.name: move-focus-n
key.summary: Focus the window that's north of the current window

key.name: move-focus-e
key.summary: Focus the window that's east of the current window
